languages.text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: После каждого шестого применения {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} псайкером все противники получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Every sixth use of a psychic power by the Psyker all enemies gain a stacking −5 penalty to all characteristics until the end of combat.
After every sixth use of a psychic power by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 penalty to all characteristics until the end of combat.

After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: После каждого шестого применения {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} псайкером все противники получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: После каждого шестого применения психосил псайкером все противники получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.
После каждого шестого применения психосил псайкером все противники получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем характеристикам до конца боя.

languages.text: 每当灵能者使用六次{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}之后，所有敌人的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}都会降低5点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者使用六次灵能能力之后，所有敌人的所有属性都会获得-5{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que el psíquico utilice por sexta vez un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g}, todos los enemigos reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el psíquico utilice por sexta vez un poder psíquico, todos los enemigos reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} acumulativa de −5 a todas sus características hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Nach jeder 6. Nutzung einer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} durch den Psioniker erleiden alle Feinde bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, der gestacked werden kann.
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Nach jeder sechsten Nutzung einer psionischen Kraft durch den Psioniker erleiden alle Feinde bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen gestapelten {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf sämtliche Eigenschaften.

languages.text: Toutes les 6 utilisations d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} par le psyker, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 s'applique à l'ensemble des {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de tous les ennemis jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les six utilisations d'un pouvoir psychique par le psyker, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -5 s'applique à l'ensemble des caractéristiques de tous les ennemis jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を6回使用するたびに、すべての敵は戦闘終了まで全{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}に-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（累積可）を受ける。
languages.original_text: After every 6th use of a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} by the psyker, all enemies gain a stacking −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: この異能者が超能力を6回使用するたびに、すべての敵は戦闘終了まで全能力に-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}（累積可）を受ける。
